short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color picker and color scheme manager.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click on any color in the app and use the commands from the context menu. 

Copy color codes directly to the clipboard: HSV, HSL, RGB, hex. 

Choose colors from: 
- a HSV picker 
- a color wheel with shades and tints 
- matching colors
- images from the web or from your computer
- several lists of preset colors 
You can also mix colors!

Use ColorCab to manage your color schemes:

- create schemes 
- easily add any color in the app to a color scheme 
- reorder colors in scheme 
- search for colors and schemes by description 
- export and import color schemes
